title: RUDIMENTA LINGVAE LATINAE
author: Eugenio Pace
excerpt: Latin is often called a "dead language." In the sense that people don’t normally use it for everyday conversations—except maybe in the Vatican.
excerptPlain: Latin is often called a _"dead language."_ In the sense that people don’t normally use it for everyday conversations—except maybe in the Vatican.

title: SALVETE DISCIPVLI
author: Eugenio Pace
excerpt: Years ago, I decided to study Latin. I had many reasons, but the main ones were:
